Work1.Title: Mobile Stage
Work1.Description: Ultra-fast setup and dismantling, a complete mobile stage ready to operate within hours, without permanent construction.

Work2.Title: Al-Liwan Garden Event
Work2.Description: An outdoor event executed using our mobile stage, combining professional platform design, impactful lighting, and high-quality sound system to deliver a complete and attractive experience for attendees in an open atmosphere.

Work3.Title: Diverse Children's Events
Work3.Description: A collection of diverse entertainment events specially designed for children, combining interactive activities, movement performances, and educational experiences in a safe and fun environment.

Work4.Title: Cold Spark Effects
Work4.Description: Safe cold spark effects used at the launch moment of Al-Kanari Garden event, adding a distinctive visual character synchronized with music and lighting.

Work5.Title: Al-Kanari Garden Event
Work5.Description: A children's entertainment event held over four days, including theatrical performances, interactive activities, and complete entertainment facilities in a fun family atmosphere.

Work6.Title: Al-Doha Park Events
Work6.Description: A family entertainment event held in an open space, integrating the mobile stage with LED screens and thoughtful technical distribution to provide a smooth and enjoyable experience for various audiences.

Details.Detail2: Setup: Mobile stage with open distribution
Details.Detail3: Elements: LED screens and audio-visual equipment

Work7.Title: Rapid Event Setup
Work7.Description: A practical demonstration of rapid event execution and setup, where the mobile stage and technical systems including lighting and sound were installed within a few hours with full operational readiness.

Details.Detail2: Setup: Mobile stage and technical systems
